ComicInfo.Summary:
Issue number six of Vanguard Illustrated sports a cover by the illustrious George Perez, who also contributes his spectacular talent to a story in this issue.
*Story Titles* The Trains Belong To Us by Cavaleri and Perez The Struggle's End by Rex Lindsey The God Run by Milligan and Freeman The Legend of Hump Hammersmith Buttkicker At Large by Dubay and Argondezzi
